stepwisetutorial.name: Step-Wise Tutorial
stepwisetutorial.description: In this brief demo you can play around with how Step-Wise works.

algebrabasics.name: Mathematics: algebra basics
algebrabasics.description: This introductory course walks you through the basics of algebra, from simplifying fractions to solving various types of linear equations.

blocks.5: Solve linear equations with multiple variables

algebrasolvingequations.name: Mathematics: solving equations
algebrasolvingequations.description: This course applies the fundamentals of algebra towards solving various types of equations, ranging from systems of linear equations up to rewritten quadratic equations.

geometrybasics.name: Mathematics: geometry basics
geometrybasics.description: In this small course you practice some basic geometry skills like calculating angles and distances.

derivativesbasics.name: Mathematics: derivatives
derivativesbasics.description: This course teaches derivatives, starting with looking up basic derivatives, and building up to applying combinations of rules.

staticsfundamentals.name: Statics: free body diagrams
staticsfundamentals.description: This tiny course helps you get used to the concept of Free Body Diagrams and apply them to calculate support forces within structures.

thermodynamicsfundamentals.name: Thermodynamics: cycles
thermodynamicsfundamentals.description: This introduction course on thermodynamics teaches the basics of thermodynamic processes, analyzing closed thermodynamic cycles. Air humidity is also briefly considered at the end.

blocks.0: Gas properties and the gas law

huwiskundevoorkennis.name: Mathematics: prior knowledge
huwiskundevoorkennis.description: This introductory course contains all skills you should already have when starting your studies. It walks you through the basics of algebra, from simplifying fractions to solving various types of basic linear equations.

blocks.5: Solve linear equations with multiple variables

saiwiskunde.name: Wiskunde bijspijkercursus
saiwiskunde.description: Via deze cursus kun je de wiskundevaardigheden bijspijkeren. Begin met haakjes en breuken en bouw op tot het oplossen van verschillende soorten vergelijkingen.

blocks.7: Lineaire vergelijkingen met meerdere variabelen oplossen

hu-voorkennis-wiskunde.name: Prior knowledge: Algebra
hu-voorkennis-wiskunde.description: This introductory course contains all algebra skills you should already have when starting your studies. It walks you through the basics of algebra, from simplifying fractions to solving various types of basic linear equations.

blocks.5: Solve linear equations with multiple variables

hu-a-wiskunde.name: Period 1A: Mathematics
hu-a-wiskunde.description: In the first period we apply the fundamentals of algebra towards solving various types of equations, ranging from systems of linear equations up to rewritten quadratic equations.

hu-a-statica.name: Period 1A: Statics intro
hu-a-statica.description: This tiny introduction course to Statics helps you get used to the concept of Free Body Diagrams and apply them to calculate support forces within structures.

hu-b-wiskunde.name: Period 1B: Mathematics derivatives
hu-b-wiskunde.description: This course teaches derivatives, starting with looking up basic derivatives, and building up to applying combinations of rules.

hu-d-thermodynamica.name: Period 1D: Thermodynamics
hu-d-thermodynamica.description: This introduction course on thermodynamics teaches the basics of thermodynamic processes, analyzing closed thermodynamic cycles.

blocks.0: Gas properties and the gas law

hu-thermodynamica.name: Period 2B: Heat and energy
hu-thermodynamica.description: In this applied thermodynamics course you learn about how various types of thermodynamic cycles work in practice, including gas turbines, Rankine cycles and cooling cycles.

hu-deeltijd-thermodynamica.name: Part-time: Modeling and processes
hu-deeltijd-thermodynamica.description: In this applied thermodynamics course you learn about how various types of thermodynamic cycles work in practice, including gas turbines, Rankine cycles and cooling cycles.
